titleStmt.title: A short discourse of mans fatall end with an vnfaygned, commendation of the worthinesse of Syr Nicholas Bacon, Knight, Lord Keeper of the great Seale of England: who disceased the xx. day of February. 1578.
titleStmt.author: Ramsay, Laurence.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Since God hath fyxt our dayes and yeares, to liue and eke to dye,".
Bacon's death year is given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
